casebody.data:
PARAMOUNT RX, INC.
v.
Robert E. DUGGAN and Agelity, Inc. No. 376A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 17, 2015. Christopher Jones, Raleigh, for Paramount Rx, Inc. Leslie C. Packer, Raleigh, for Duggan, Robert E., et al. James Michael Weiss, Raleigh, for Duggan, Robert E., et al.

Opinion *436The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of November 2015 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of November 2015."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 28th day of December 2015 to serve his/her proposed record upon the district attorney. The parties shall then proceed to settle and file the record on appeal pursuant to the provisions of Appellate Rules 11 and 12.
